function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decreased immunity due to physical inactivity and social distancing measures","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to diseases and infections","Mitigation":"Promotion of physical activity, improved ventilation in public spaces, and vaccination campaigns","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, fitness apps, and telemedicine","People":"General public","Owner":"Health authorities and urban planners"},{"Description":"Potential for increased disease transmission in densely populated areas","Impact":"Higher risk of contagion and rapid spread of diseases","Mitigation":"Implementation of spatial planning measures to reduce population density, improved sanitation and hygiene facilities, and vaccination campaigns","Technologies":"GIS mapping for population density analysis, sanitation infrastructure, and telemedicine","People":"Residents of densely populated areas","Owner":"Urban planners and local government"},{"Description":"Impact on socio-economic composition of cities","Impact":"Disruption to livelihoods, increased inequality, and strain on public services","Mitigation":"Social support programs, economic stimulus packages, and investment in public infrastructure","Technologies":"Online platforms for social support programs, economic modeling tools, and infrastructure management systems","People":"Urban communities and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Local government and community organizations"}]}
